publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1925 John Wilson: Firpark School—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff of Firpark special educational needs school in Motherwell for its success at the recent Carlisle Rock Challenge heat on Friday 2 May 2008, where the school took third place overall and also won the Cumbria Healthy Schools Award for the Best Set Design and the Staging and the Be your Best Foundation Award for Media Management and further notes the tremendous effort, dedication and commitment of the pupils and staff at the school in staging an energetic, fun and polished performance.

S3M-1925 John Wilson: Firpark School—That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff of Firpark special educational needs school in Motherwell for its success at the recent Carlisle Rock Challenge heat on Friday 2 May 2008, where the school took third place overall and also won the Cumbria Healthy Schools Award for the Best Set Design and the Staging and the Be your Best Foundation Award for Media Management and further notes the tremendous effort, dedication and commitment of the pupils and staff at the school in staging an energetic, fun and polished performance.
S3M-1925 Firpark School (lodged on 15 May 2008) Jack McConnell*
S3M-1925 Firpark School (lodged on 15 May 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
